lyrics.text:
‘Eiki ko kimautolu ni,
Ko ho kakai angahia;
‘Oku mau fakataha ni,
Ke hū ki he ‘Afiona.

Ko e kakai angahala,
Pea mo e tu’utāmaki,
Ki he mate ‘angaua,
‘I he’emau angakovi.

Ka ke manatu’i,’Eiki
Kia Sīsū, ko ho Alo;
Mo ‘ene pekia kovi,
Ko homau fetongi ia.

Pea fakamolemole,
‘Emau kovi kotoa pē,
Ko e me’a ‘ia Ssū,
Ko homau Fakalaloa.

Ke mau fiemālie ai
‘I he’emau ma’u ‘i loto,
‘A e ‘ofa kuo lingi,
‘E ho Laumālie Lelei.

Ke tupu ai ‘emau ‘ofa,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona,
Ke hoko ai ‘emau ‘ofa,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē.
